USER QUERY: When either Basement ControLinc - 4 or Basement ControLinc - 5 is fast-turned on (Fast On) between Monday and Friday from 18:00 to 23:00, set that device's backlight to 80% and write changes.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekday evening fast-on sets basement backlight",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "Set backlight to 80% when either device is fast-on on weekday evenings",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "0 77 5D 4", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "0 77 5D 5", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "18:00", "to": { "time": "23:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "0 77 5D 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 2 } ] },
      { "device": "0 77 5D 4", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "0 77 5D 5", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 2 } ] },
      { "device": "0 77 5D 5", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "When either ControLinc receives a Fast On control during weekday evening hours, set its backlight to 80% and send Write Changes to persist the setting. Both devices addressed so either trigger results in both devices being updated for consistent visibility."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
